data.subject: When I Was A Boy
data.lyric:
When I was a boy I had a dream
 All about the things I'd like to be
 Soon as I was in my bed
 Music

data.subject: Say Something
data.lyric:
Say something, I'm giving up on you
 I'll be the one if you want me to
 Anywhere I would've followed

data.subject: Hold Each Other
data.lyric:
I miss the words we used to say
 I miss the sounds of yesterday
 I miss the games we used to play li

data.subject: I Want A Hippopotamus For Christmas
data.lyric:
I want a hippopotamus for Christmas
 Only a hippopotamus will do
 I don't want a doll, no dinky Tink

data.subject: I Want A Hippopotamus For Christmas
data.lyric:
I want a hippopotamus for Christmas
 Only a hippopotamus will do
 Don't want a dog, no inky dinker T
